help-file.title: "ARCANE WHIRLWIND"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Generic
"Arcane Whirlwind", when successful, transfers magic from the victim to the caster. Any and/or all magic the victim has, positive or negative, may be potentially be stripped from the victim and granted to the caster.
